content:
FabricChaosEngineException Class

Definition

The exception that is thrown when Chaos engine has encountered something unexpected.

In this Article

[System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessage("StyleCop.CSharp.MaintainabilityRules", "SA1402:FileMayOnlyContainASingleClass", Justification="Exception")]
public class FabricChaosEngineException : System.Fabric.FabricException
Inheritance
Exception
FabricException
FabricChaosEngineException
Attributes
System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessage

Inherited Members

ErrorCode

Constructors

FabricChaosEngineException()

Initializes a new instance of the FabricChaosAlreadyRunningException class.
FabricChaosEngineException(String)

Initializes a new instance of the FabricChaosAlreadyRunningException class with a specified error message.
FabricChaosEngineException(SerializationInfo, StreamingContext)

Initializes a new instance of the FabricChaosAlreadyRunningException class with serialized data.
FabricChaosEngineException(String, Exception)

Initializes a new instance of the FabricChaosAlreadyRunningException class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
